challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Ni diruduna nengoen, baina orain pobrea nago.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: I was rich, but now I am poor.

challenges.formattedSolution: Ni diruduna nengoen, baina orain pobrea nago.
I was rich, but now I am poor.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Zu bustia zeunden, baina orain lehorra zaude.
